Message:
Three days after my meal,
the village was in an uproar.

To the villagers’ pleas,
an inquisitor responded solemnly.

“Those creatures in the castle
have stolen his soul!
This village is under attack!”

With each word
from the inquisitor,
the frightened villagers
began to arm themselves,
one after another.

The fervor spread
quickly like a flame,

and soon the entire village
was roaring with anger.

“Burn the castle to the ground!
Kill every last one of
that cursed clan!”

All I could do was hide in
a nearby building’s shadow,
holding my trembling
body tightly.

How can it be that
easy for them to do
something so cruel...?”

At that moment,
I wasn’t scared of being caught.

Instead, I was shaking as
the humans screamed
like madmen.

...I have to tell everyone
back at the castle!
I have to hurry...!

Forcing my shaking legs
to move, I ran.
